query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) --- Date: 2019/02/24 Updated to include OS details by joining MGMT$MGMT_ECM_OS. SELECT HOST_NAME , VIRTUAL , DOMAIN , OS_SUMMARY OS , OS_VENDOR , DISTRIBUTOR_VERSION , CPU_COUNT , PHYSICAL_CPU_COUNT , LOGICAL_CPU_COUNT , TOTAL_CPU_CORES , SYSTEM_CONFIG , MA , FREQ , MEM , DISK , VENDOR_NAME --, SNAPSHOT_GUID , TARGET_GUID --, PLATFORM_ID --, TARGET_NAME --, TARGET_TYPE --, LAST_COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP --, RUN_LEVEL --, DEFAULT_RUN_LEVEL --, HOST_ID --, PLATFORM_VERSION_ID --, DBM_MEMBER --, EXALOGIC_MEMBER --, SYSTEM_SERIAL_NUMBER FROM sysman.MGMT$OS_HW_SUMMARY order by HOST_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE --, LAST_LOAD_TIME --, ORACLE_HOME --, ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('oracle_home') AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/01/06 (of last update/validation) select ddie.DATABASE_NAME , ddie.GLOBAL_NAME , ddie.INSTANCE_NAME , ddie.HOST_NAME , ddie.DBVERSION , ddie.TARGET_TYPE , ddie.LOG_MODE , CASE WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE),'FM9000.00') || ' B' END DB_SIZE --, STARTUP_TIME --, LOGINS --, OPEN_MODE , ddie.DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , ddie.CHARACTERSET , ddie.NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , ddie.CREATION_DATE , ddie.EDITION , ddie.IS_64BIT , ddie.REL_STATUS , ddie.SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN , ddie.TARGET_GUID from sysman.MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie , sysman.MGMT$DB_DATAFILES MDD where ddie.HOST_NAME = MDD.HOST_NAME AND ddie.HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME AND ddie.TARGET_NAME = MDD.TARGET_NAME AND ddie.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' group by ddie.DATABASE_NAME , ddie.GLOBAL_NAME , ddie.INSTANCE_NAME , ddie.HOST_NAME , ddie.DBVERSION , ddie.TARGET_TYPE , ddie.LOG_MODE --, STARTUP_TIME --, LOGINS --, OPEN_MODE , ddie.DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , ddie.CHARACTERSET , ddie.NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , ddie.CREATION_DATE , ddie.EDITION , ddie.IS_64BIT , ddie.REL_STATUS , ddie.SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN , ddie.TARGET_GUID order by ddie.DATABASE_NAME , ddie.GLOBAL_NAME , ddie.INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/01/06 (of last update/validation) select DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME , ddie.HOST_NAME , DBVERSION --, CM_TARGET_TYPE , ddie.TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , CASE WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(MDD.FILE_SIZE),'FM9000.00') || ' B' END DB_SIZE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET --, CREATION_DATE --, EDITION --, IS_64BIT --, REL_STATUS --, SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN from -- CM$MGMT_DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO_ECM ddie sysman.MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie , sysman.MGMT$DB_DATAFILES MDD where ddie.HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME AND ddie.HOST_NAME = MDD.HOST_NAME AND ddie.TARGET_NAME = MDD.TARGET_NAME AND ddie.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' group by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME , ddie.HOST_NAME , DBVERSION , ddie.TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET --, CREATION_DATE --, EDITION --, IS_64BIT --, REL_STATUS --, SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('has') AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('weblogic_domain') AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('weblogic_cluster') AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('osm_instance') AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE --, TARGET_GUID --, FILE_NAME --, TABLESPACE_NAME , STATUS , CASE WHEN sum(FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(FILE_SIZE) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024),2),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(FILE_SIZE) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(FILE_SIZE)/1024,2),'FM900000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(FILE_SIZE),'FM9000000.00') || ' B' END FILE_SIZE --, sum(FILE_SIZE) FILE_SIZE_H --, AUTOEXTENSIBLE --, INCREMENT_BY --, MAX_FILE_SIZE --, OS_STORAGE_ENTITY /* , CASE WHEN sum(CREATE_BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(CREATE_BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(CREATE_BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(CREATE_BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(CREATE_BYTES) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(CREATE_BYTES)/(1024*1024),2),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(CREATE_BYTES) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(CREATE_BYTES)/1024,2),'FM900000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(CREATE_BYTES),'FM9000000.00') || ' MB' END CREATE_BYTES */ , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP --, CREATE_BYTES from sysman.MGMT$DB_DATAFILES where TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME AND STATUS = 'ONLINE' group by HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE --, TARGET_GUID , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP --, FILE_NAME --, TABLESPACE_NAME , STATUS --, AUTOEXTENSIBLE --, INCREMENT_BY --, MAX_FILE_SIZE , OS_STORAGE_ENTITY order by HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE --, TARGET_GUID , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP --, FILE_NAME --, TABLESPACE_NAME , STATUS --, AUTOEXTENSIBLE --, INCREMENT_BY --, MAX_FILE_SIZE , OS_STORAGE_ENTITY

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/02/12 (of last update/validation) set head off feed off set line 132 pages 1000 with clusters as ( select distinct CLUSTER_NAME , NODE_LIST , SCAN_NAME from sysman.MGMT_CLUSTER_CONFIG where instr(node_list, substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME,'.')-1)) = 1 order by CLUSTER_NAME ) , cluster_services as ( select CLUSTER_NAME , DATABASE_UNIQUE_NAME DATABASE , SERVICE_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , ENABLED , TAFPOLICY , PREFERRED_INSTANCES , AVAILABLE_INSTANCES , RUNNING_INSTANCES , SERVER_GROUP , RESOURCE_NAME --, SERVICE_CENTRIC_TYPE , SERVICE_CARDINALITY , DATABASE_TYPE , PDB_NAME , PQ_SERVICE_NAME from sysman.MGMT_RAC_SERVICES where CLUSTER_NAME = (select CLUSTER_NAME from clusters) AND SERVICE_TYPE = 'user' order by CLUSTER_NAME , DATABASE_UNIQUE_NAME , SERVICE_NAME ) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- select case when instr(c.target_name, '.') > 1 then substr(c.target_name,1, instr(c.target_name, '.')-1) else c.target_name end ||' = ' ||chr(13)||chr(10)||' (DESCRIPTION = ' ||chr(13)||chr(10)||' (ADDRESS_LIST = '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| case when instr((select node_list from clusters), substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME,'.')-1)) = 1 then ' (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = '|| (select SCAN_NAME from clusters where instr((select node_list from clusters), substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME,'.')-1)) = 1 )||')(PORT = 1521))' else ' (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = '|| a.HOST_NAME ||')(PORT = 1521))' end --||chr(13)||chr(10)||' (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = '|| b.property_value --||')(PORT = 1521))' ||chr(13)||chr(10)||' )' ||chr(13)||chr(10)||' '||'(CONNECT_DATA = (SERVICE_NAME = '|| c.target_name||'))' ||chr(13)||chr(10)||' )' tnsname from mgmt_targets c , mgmt_targets a , MGMT_TARGET_PROPERTIES b --, clusters cl where a.target_guid = b.target_guid and a.target_type = 'host' and a.host_name = c.host_name and c.target_type = 'oracle_database' and lower(b.property_name) = 'ip_address' and a.HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME ORDER BY c.target_name , a.host_name;

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('oracle_listener') AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

with all_targets as ( select TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME DISPLAY_NAME , TARGET_GUID from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME ) /* select --BLACKOUT_GUID BLACKOUT_NAME , (select REASON from MGMT_BLACKOUT_REASON_E R where R.REASON_ID = B.REASON_ID) REASON , BLACKOUT_DESC , CASE WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '4' THEN 'ACTIVE' WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '5' THEN 'STOP PENDING' WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '10' THEN 'STOPPED' WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '11' THEN 'ENDED' ELSE to_char(BLACKOUT_STATUS) END BLACKOUT_STATUS , ALLOW_JOBS , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_BY --, CREATING_EMD_URL , TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATION_DATE , TO_CHAR(MODIFICATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') MODIFICATION_DATE , CURRENT_OCCURRENCE , FULL_BLK_ALL_HOSTS , IS_PATCHING_BLACKOUT , IS_SLA_REQUIRED from EM_BLACKOUTS_NG_E B where CREATED_BY <> '<SYSTEM>' */ select --MONTHS --, DAYS TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , BLACKOUT_NAME , CREATED_BY --, BLACKOUT_GUID , OCCURRENCE_START_TIME , OCCURRENCE_END_TIME , BLACKOUT_START_TIME , BLACKOUT_END_TIME , STATUS , REASON , REPEATING_BLACKOUT , FREQUENCY_CODE , INTERVAL , OCCURRENCE_NUMBER --, TARGET_GUID from GC$BLACKOUT_TARGETS where TARGET_GUID in (select TARGET_GUID from all_targets) order by OCCURRENCE_START_TIME

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/14 (of last update/validation) --- Data validated/Matched with Cloud Control Output. SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME , COUNT_OF_COLLECTIONS , round(AVG_VALUE,3) AVG_VALUE , round(MIN_VALUE,3) MIN_VALUE , round(MAX_VALUE,3) MAX_VALUE , round(STDDEV_VALUE,3) STDDEV_VALUE FROM --GC_METRIC_VALUES_DAILY sysman.GC_METRIC_VALUES_HOURLY where METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'CPUUsageSummary' AND METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'OverAllUsagePct' AND instr(ENTITY_NAME, :HOST_NAME) >=1 AND COLLECTION_TIME between trunc(sysdate) - 7 and trunc(sysdate) order by COLLECTION_TIME
select metric_column , metric_name from sysman.mgmt$metric_details where target_name = :HOST_NAME and metric_column = 'HostInfocpu' and metric_name = 'ProcessInfo'

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/01/27 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME DISPLAY_NAME --, SERVICE_TYPE --, MONITORING_MODE --, LAST_LOAD_TIME --, ORACLE_HOME --, ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from sysman.MGMT_TARGETS where --TARGET_TYPE in ('oracle_listener') --AND HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 20189/01/27 (of last update/validation) select distinct HOSTNAME , DOMAIN , VENDOR_NAME , CPU_COUNT , CPU_BOARD_COUNT , PHYSICAL_CPU_COUNT , LOGICAL_CPU_COUNT , TOTAL_CPU_CORES , MACHINE_ARCHITECTURE , CLOCK_FREQ_IN_MHZ , MEMORY_SIZE_IN_MB --, AVAIL_MEMORY_SIZE_IN_MB , LOCAL_DISK_SPACE_IN_GB --, AVAIL_LOCAL_DISK_SPACE_IN_GB , SYSTEM_CONFIG , IOCARD_COUNT --, FAN_COUNT --, POWER_SUPPLY_COUNT --, BOOT_DISK_VOLUME_SERIAL_NUM --, SYSTEM_BIOS , SYSTEM_SERIAL_NUMBER , HOST_ID , VIRTUAL from sysman.MGMT_ECM_HW where HOSTNAME = substr(:HOST_NAME,1, instr(:HOST_NAME,'.')-1) order by HOSTNAME

SELECT HOST , HOME_NAME , HOME_LOCATION , PLATFORM , IS_PSU , PATCH_RELEASE , IS_ONLINE_PATCH , PATCH , INSTALLATION_TIME , BUGS --, TARGET_GUID --, CONTAINER_GUID FROM sysman.MGMT$APPLIED_PATCHES where --TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' AND ( instr((select :HOST_NAME from dual), substr(HOST, 1, instr(HOST, '.')-1)) >0 or instr((select :HOST_NAME from dual),HOST)> 0 ) order by HOME_NAME , HOME_LOCATION , IS_PSU , PATCH_RELEASE , PATCH , INSTALLATION_TIME

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM sysman.EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES WHERE ENTITY_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME

with db_arch as ( select DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , listagg(INSTANCE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN Group (order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN ) as instances , listagg(HOST_NAME, ', ') WITHIN Group (order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN ) as servers , DBVERSION , LOG_MODE from sysman.MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND LOG_MODE = 'ARCHIVELOG' group by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN order by DATABASE_NAME ), avg_archive as ( SELECT TARGET_NAME , NAME , STATUS , INPUT_TYPE , OUTPUT_DEVICE_TYPE , START_TIME , END_TIME , TIME_TAKEN_DISPLAY , CASE WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INPUT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END INPUT_BYTES , CASE WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(OUTPUT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END OUTPUT_BYTES FROM MGMT$DB_BACKUP_HISTORY a , db_arch b WHERE ( a.TARGET_NAME = b.GLOBAL_NAME OR a.TARGET_NAME = b.DATABASE_NAME ) AND trunc(start_time) = trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by START_TIME ) , disk_groups as ( select distinct DISK_GROUP, trunc(TOTAL_SIZE,2) TOTAL_SIZE from MGMT_ASM_DISKGROUP_ECM_E ) , file_systems as ( SELECT distinct A.TARGET_NAME , A.NAME , ROUND( A.SIZEB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) SIZE_GB , ROUND( A.USEDB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) USED_GB , ROUND( A.FREEB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024,2 ) FREE_GB FROM MGMT$STORAGE_REPORT_DATA A WHERE NAME like '/u0_' ORDER BY A.TARGET_NAME , A.NAME ) SELECT distinct c.servers , CASE WHEN instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_') > 1 then substr(a.TARGET_NAME, 1, instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE a.TARGET_NAME END TARGET_NAME , c.instances , a.VALUE db_recovery_file_dest , CASE WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN b.VALUE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.VALUE,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END db_recovery_file_dest_size , D.TOTAL_SIZE FROM MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS a , MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS b , db_arch c , disk_groups d --, file_systems e WHERE a.HOST_NAME = b.HOST_NAME AND a.TARGET_NAME = b.TARGET_NAME AND --a.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND --b.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND a.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest' AND b.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' AND lower(a.target_name) like lower(c.database_name)||'%' AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(a.host_name))=1 AND a.value like '%'||D.DISK_GROUP AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(:HOST_NAME)) >= 1 union SELECT distinct c.servers , CASE WHEN instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_') > 1 then substr(a.TARGET_NAME, 1, instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE a.TARGET_NAME END TARGET_NAME , c.instances , a.VALUE db_recovery_file_dest , CASE WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN b.VALUE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.VALUE,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END db_recovery_file_dest_size , E.FREE_GB FROM MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS a , MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS b , db_arch c --, disk_groups d , file_systems e WHERE a.HOST_NAME = b.HOST_NAME AND a.TARGET_NAME = b.TARGET_NAME AND a.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND b.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND a.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest' AND b.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' AND lower(a.target_name) like lower(c.database_name)||'%' AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(a.host_name))>=1 AND substr(a.value,1,4) = e.name AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(:HOST_NAME)) >= 1 order by --a.HOST_NAME TARGET_NAME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , VIOLATION_TYPE , ALERT_STATE , trunc(ALERT_DURATION,3) ALERT_DURATION --, TARGET_GUID --, VIOLATION_GUID --, VIOLATION_LEVEL --, CYCLE_GUID --, METRIC_NAME --, METRIC_COLUMN --, METRIC_GUID , METRIC_LABEL , COLUMN_LABEL --, COLUMN_LABEL_NLSID --, KEY_VALUE --, KEY_VALUE2 --, KEY_VALUE3 --, KEY_VALUE4 --, KEY_VALUE5 --, KEY_VALUE6 --, KEY_VALUE7 , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , MESSAGE --, MESSAGE_NLSID , MESSAGE_PARAMS --, ACTION_MESSAGE --, ACTION_MESSAGE_NLSID --, ACTION_MESSAGE_PARAMS --, TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, EVENT_INSTANCE_ID FROM sysman.MGMT$ALERT_HISTORY WHERE TARGET_NAME = :HOST_NAME AND COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 91 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/01/06 (of last update/validation)
select DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME , TARGET_NAME , HOST_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , CREATION_DATE , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN , TARGET_GUID from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select :INSTANCE_NAME INSTANCE_NAME , INIT_PARAM_NAME "NAME" , CASE WHEN INIT_PARAM_NAME in ( 'memory_target' , 'memory_max_target' , 'sga_target' , 'sga_max_size' , 'streams_pool_size' , 'pga_aggregate_target' , 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' ) THEN CASE WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024/1024/1024||'G' WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024*1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024/1024||'M' WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024||'K' ELSE INIT_PARAM_VALUE END ELSE INIT_PARAM_VALUE END "VALUE" , INIT_PARAM_IS_DEFAULT "DEFAULT" --, TARGET_GUID from MGMT$CS_DB_INIT_PARAMS dip where TARGET_GUID = :TARGET_GUID AND INIT_PARAM_NAME IN ( 'compatible' , 'db_name' , 'sga_target' , 'sga_max_size' , 'memory_target' , 'memory_max_target' , 'pga_aggregate_target' , 'streams_pool_size' , 'open_cursors' , 'optimizer_features_enable' , 'processes' , 'parallel_max_servers' , 'parallel_min_servers' , 'parallel_servers_target' , '_dlm_stats_collect' ) order by INIT_PARAM_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INIT_PARAM_NAME "NAME" , CASE WHEN INIT_PARAM_NAME in ( 'memory_target' , 'memory_max_target' , 'sga_target' , 'sga_max_size' , 'streams_pool_size' , 'pga_aggregate_target' , 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' ) THEN CASE WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024/1024/1024||'G' WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024*1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024/1024||'M' WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024||'K' ELSE INIT_PARAM_VALUE END ELSE INIT_PARAM_VALUE END "VALUE" , INIT_PARAM_IS_DEFAULT --, TARGET_GUID from MGMT$CS_DB_INIT_PARAMS where TARGET_GUID = :TARGET_GUID AND INIT_PARAM_IS_DEFAULT = 'FALSE'

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INIT_PARAM_NAME , CASE WHEN INIT_PARAM_NAME in ( 'memory_target' , 'memory_max_target' , 'sga_target' , 'sga_max_size' , 'streams_pool_size' , 'pga_aggregate_target' , 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' ) THEN CASE WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024/1024/1024||'G' WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024*1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024/1024||'M' WHEN INIT_PARAM_VALUE > to_number(1024) THEN to_number(INIT_PARAM_VALUE)/1024||'K' ELSE INIT_PARAM_VALUE END ELSE INIT_PARAM_VALUE END "VALUE" , INIT_PARAM_IS_DEFAULT --, TARGET_GUID from MGMT$CS_DB_INIT_PARAMS where TARGET_GUID = :TARGET_GUID

docproperty.title: Database Instance NLS Parameters (OEM Cloud Control)
docproperty.author: Anand Mahajani

query.sql: select PATCH , HOST , PLATFORM , HOME_LOCATION , PATCH_RELEASE , IS_PSU , INSTALLATION_TIME , IS_ONLINE_PATCH , TARGET_GUID , HOME_NAME , CONTAINER_GUID , BUGS from MGMT$APPLIED_PATCHES where --TARGET_GUID = :TARGET_GUID HOST = :HOST_NAME

SELECT :GLOBAL_NAME , TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS CALENDAR_MONTH , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ) , 2 ) AS SIZE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( USED.USED_GB ) , 2 ) AS USED_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB - USED.USED_GB ) , 2 ) AS FREE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( ( USED.USED_GB * 100 ) / DECODE ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB , 0 , 1 , A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ) ) , 2 ) AS USED_PCT FROM ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS SIZE_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE T.TARGET_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME AND --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceAllocated' ) AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= '2018-12-01' AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= SYSdATE GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) A_SIZE , ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS USED_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE T.TARGET_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME AND --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceUsed' ) AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= '2018-12-01' AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= SYSDATE GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) USED WHERE A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP = USED.MONTH_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) ORDER BY TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 'YYYY-MM-DD' )

select CLUSTER_NAME , CRS_HOME , ACTIVE_VERSION , NODE_LIST , MGMT_DB_CONFIGURED , SCAN_NAME , SCAN_PORT , EONS_PORT --, GNS , OCR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_LOCATION --, VENDOR_CLUSTER , OCR_MIRROR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_MIRROR_LOCATION --, GNS_DOMAIN --, GNS_SUBNET from MGMT_CLUSTER_CONFIG where instr((select NODE_LIST from dual), substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME, '.')-1)) >0 order by CLUSTER_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/09/14 (of last update/validation) --- Data validated/Matched with Cloud Control Output. SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME , COUNT_OF_COLLECTIONS , round(AVG_VALUE,3) AVG_VALUE , round(MIN_VALUE,3) MIN_VALUE , round(MAX_VALUE,3) MAX_VALUE , round(STDDEV_VALUE,3) STDDEV_VALUE FROM --GC_METRIC_VALUES_DAILY GC_METRIC_VALUES_HOURLY where METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'CPUUsageSummary' AND METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'OverAllUsagePct' AND instr(ENTITY_NAME, :HOST_NAME) >=1 AND COLLECTION_TIME between trunc(sysdate) - 1 and trunc(sysdate) order by COLLECTION_TIME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , VIOLATION_TYPE , ALERT_STATE , trunc(ALERT_DURATION,3) ALERT_DURATION --, TARGET_GUID --, VIOLATION_GUID --, VIOLATION_LEVEL --, CYCLE_GUID --, METRIC_NAME --, METRIC_COLUMN --, METRIC_GUID , METRIC_LABEL , COLUMN_LABEL --, COLUMN_LABEL_NLSID --, KEY_VALUE --, KEY_VALUE2 --, KEY_VALUE3 --, KEY_VALUE4 --, KEY_VALUE5 --, KEY_VALUE6 --, KEY_VALUE7 , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , MESSAGE --, MESSAGE_NLSID , MESSAGE_PARAMS --, ACTION_MESSAGE --, ACTION_MESSAGE_NLSID --, ACTION_MESSAGE_PARAMS --, TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, EVENT_INSTANCE_ID FROM MGMT$ALERT_HISTORY WHERE instr(TARGET_NAME, :INSTANCE_NAME) >=1 AND COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 91 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('osm_instance') order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from MGMT_TARGETS where --HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME --instr(:HOST_NAME, substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME, '.')-2))>0 TARGET_TYPE in ('osm_instance') AND HOST_NAME like (substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME, '.')-2)||'%') order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , MONITORING_MODE , LAST_LOAD_TIME , ORACLE_HOME , ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from MGMT_TARGETS where --HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME TARGET_TYPE in ('osm_cluster') AND HOST_NAME like (substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME, '.')-2)||'%') order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES WHERE ENTITY_NAME = :CLUSTER_NAME order by ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , VIOLATION_TYPE , ALERT_STATE , trunc(ALERT_DURATION,3) ALERT_DURATION --, TARGET_GUID --, VIOLATION_GUID --, VIOLATION_LEVEL --, CYCLE_GUID --, METRIC_NAME --, METRIC_COLUMN --, METRIC_GUID , METRIC_LABEL , COLUMN_LABEL --, COLUMN_LABEL_NLSID --, KEY_VALUE --, KEY_VALUE2 --, KEY_VALUE3 --, KEY_VALUE4 --, KEY_VALUE5 --, KEY_VALUE6 --, KEY_VALUE7 , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , MESSAGE --, MESSAGE_NLSID , MESSAGE_PARAMS --, ACTION_MESSAGE --, ACTION_MESSAGE_NLSID --, ACTION_MESSAGE_PARAMS --, TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, EVENT_INSTANCE_ID FROM MGMT$ALERT_HISTORY WHERE TARGET_NAME = :TARGET_NAME AND COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 91 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select database , count(*) "# of Errors" from ( SELECT t.target_name Database , d.COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP timestamp --, SUBSTR(d.key_value, 1, INSTR(d.key_value, '/') - 1) timestamp , MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)) errStack , case when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-00600') >= 1 then 'Check Metalink for function Associated with ORA-00600: patch or upgrade' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-07445') >= 1 then 'Check Metalink for function Associated with ORA-07445: patch or upgrade' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1642') >= 1 then 'Attempted alter tablespace begin/end backup for READ-ONLY tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-04031') >= 1 then 'Check memory FootPrint on the server and increase Shared Pool if additional memory available' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-4031') >= 1 then 'Check memory FootPrint on the server and increase Shared Pool if additional memory available' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-00060') >= 1 then 'Application issue. No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-01013') >= 1 then 'No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-01555') >= 1 then 'Evaluate possibility of adding frequent commits or Increase UNDO' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-3136') >= 1 then 'Add sqlnet.ora parameter INBOUND_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_LISTENER=120. For RAC check for the appropriate syntax.' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1537') >= 1 then 'Replication Manager attempted to put read-only tablespace in hot backup mode: No action is required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-12012') >= 1 then 'Application issue. No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-01861') >= 1 then 'Application issue. No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1651') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to UNDO tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1652') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to TEMP tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1653') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to Table (data) tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1654') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to Index tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1683') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to Index tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1688') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to partitioned table/index tablespace' else ' ' end Suggested_Action FROM sysman.mgmt_targets t --, sysman.MGMT$METRIC_DETAILS m , sysman.mgmt_metrics m , sysman.mgmt_string_metric_history d WHERE t.target_type = 'oracle_database' AND m.target_type = t.target_type AND d.target_guid = t.target_guid AND d.metric_guid = m.metric_guid AND m.type_meta_ver = t.type_meta_ver AND ( m.category_prop_1 = t.category_prop_1 OR m.category_prop_1 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_2 = t.category_prop_2 OR m.category_prop_2 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_3 = t.category_prop_3 OR m.category_prop_3 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_4 = t.category_prop_4 OR m.category_prop_4 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_5 = t.category_prop_5 OR m.category_prop_5 = ' ') AND trunc(d.collection_timestamp) > trunc(sysdate) - 3 AND m.metric_name IN ( 'alertLog' , 'archFull' , 'db_alert_log' , 'db_alert_log_status' ) AND m.metric_column IN ( 'alertLogName' , 'archiveHungErrors' , 'archiveHungErrStack' , 'blockCorruptErrStack' , 'genericErrors' , 'genericErrStack' , 'mediaFailureErrStack' , 'sessTerminateErrStack' , 'traceFileName' ) GROUP BY t.target_name , d.key_value , d.target_guid , d.collection_timestamp ORDER BY t.target_name , d.collection_timestamp ) group by database order by database

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select --rownum SR# database , timestamp , errStack "Error Stack" , Suggested_Action "Suggested Action" from ( SELECT t.target_name Database , d.COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP timestamp --, SUBSTR(d.key_value, 1, INSTR(d.key_value, '/') - 1) timestamp , MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, replace(d.string_value, '*', null))) errStack , case when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-00600') >= 1 then 'Check Metalink for function/argument Associated with ORA-00600: patch or upgrade' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-07445') >= 1 then 'Check Metalink for function/argument Associated with ORA-07445: patch or upgrade' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1642') >= 1 then 'Attempted alter tablespace begin/end backup for READ-ONLY tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-04031') >= 1 then 'Check memory FootPrint on the server and increase Shared Pool if additional memory available' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-4031') >= 1 then 'Check memory FootPrint on the server and increase Shared Pool if additional memory available' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-00060') >= 1 then 'Application issue. No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-01013') >= 1 then 'No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-01555') >= 1 then 'Evaluate possibility of adding frequent commits or Increase UNDO' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-3136') >= 1 then 'Add sqlnet.ora parameter INBOUND_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_LISTENER=120. For RAC check for the appropriate syntax.' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1537') >= 1 then 'Replication Manager attempted to put read-only tablespace in hot backup mode: No action is required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-12012') >= 1 then 'Application issue. No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-01861') >= 1 then 'Application issue. No System DBA Action required' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1651') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to UNDO tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1652') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to TEMP tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1653') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to Table (data) tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1654') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to Index tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1683') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to Index tablespace' when instr(MAX(DECODE(m.metric_column, 'traceFileName', null, d.string_value)), 'ORA-1688') >= 1 then 'Add storage/datafile to partitioned table/index tablespace' else ' ' end Suggested_Action FROM sysman.mgmt_targets t --, sysman.MGMT$METRIC_DETAILS m , sysman.mgmt_metrics m , sysman.mgmt_string_metric_history d WHERE t.target_type = 'oracle_database' AND m.target_type = t.target_type AND d.target_guid = t.target_guid AND d.metric_guid = m.metric_guid AND m.type_meta_ver = t.type_meta_ver AND ( m.category_prop_1 = t.category_prop_1 OR m.category_prop_1 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_2 = t.category_prop_2 OR m.category_prop_2 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_3 = t.category_prop_3 OR m.category_prop_3 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_4 = t.category_prop_4 OR m.category_prop_4 = ' ') AND ( m.category_prop_5 = t.category_prop_5 OR m.category_prop_5 = ' ') AND trunc(d.collection_timestamp) > trunc(sysdate) - 3 AND m.metric_name IN ( 'alertLog' , 'archFull' , 'db_alert_log' , 'db_alert_log_status' ) AND m.metric_column IN ( 'alertLogName' , 'archiveHungErrors' , 'archiveHungErrStack' , 'blockCorruptErrStack' , 'genericErrors' , 'genericErrStack' , 'mediaFailureErrStack' , 'sessTerminateErrStack' , 'traceFileName' ) GROUP BY t.target_name , d.key_value , d.target_guid , d.collection_timestamp ORDER BY t.target_name , d.collection_timestamp ) where database = :DATABASE order by timestamp

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE --, TARGET_GUID --, COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME --, BANNER --, HOST , INSTANCE_NAME , STARTUP_TIME , LOGINS , LOG_MODE , OPEN_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , DV_STATUS_CODE , CREATION_DATE , RELEASE , EDITION , DBVERSION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO order by HOST_NAME , TARGET_TYPE

select --BLACKOUT_GUID BLACKOUT_NAME , (select REASON from MGMT_BLACKOUT_REASON_E R where R.REASON_ID = B.REASON_ID) REASON , BLACKOUT_DESC , CASE WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '4' THEN 'ACTIVE' WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '5' THEN 'STOP PENDING' WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '10' THEN 'STOPPED' WHEN BLACKOUT_STATUS = '11' THEN 'ENDED' ELSE to_char(BLACKOUT_STATUS) END BLACKOUT_STATUS , ALLOW_JOBS , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_BY --, CREATING_EMD_URL , TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATION_DATE , TO_CHAR(MODIFICATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') MODIFICATION_DATE , CURRENT_OCCURRENCE , FULL_BLK_ALL_HOSTS , IS_PATCHING_BLACKOUT , IS_SLA_REQUIRED from EM_BLACKOUTS_NG_E B where CREATED_BY <> '<SYSTEM>'

SELECT TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME , START_TIME , END_TIME , CREATED_BY , BLACKOUT_NAME --, BLACKOUT_GUID --, TARGET_GUID , STATUS , OCCURRENCE FROM MGMT$BLACKOUT_HISTORY WHERE BLACKOUT_NAME = :BLACKOUT_NAME ORDER BY TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME , START_TIME

display.name: XX Monthly Tablespace Growth
display.description: This script belongs under OEM (Cloud Control group)

query.sql:
--select table_name, column_name from user_tab_columns where lower(column_name) like '%cpu%';
SELECT :DATABASE_NAME DATABASE_NAME , TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS CALENDAR_MONTH , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ), 2 ) AS SIZE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS USED_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB - USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS FREE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( ( USED.USED_GB * 100 ) / DECODE ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB, 0, 1, A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ) ), 2 ) AS USED_PCT FROM ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS SIZE_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND T.TARGET_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceAllocated' ) AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) A_SIZE , ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS USED_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND T.TARGET_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 ! = 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceUsed' ) AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) USED WHERE A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP = USED.MONTH_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY --A_SIZE.TARGET_NAME TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) ORDER BY TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' )

--select table_name, column_name from user_tab_columns where lower(column_name) like '%cpu%';
SELECT :DATABASE_NAME , TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS CALENDAR_MONTH , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ), 2 ) AS SIZE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS USED_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB - USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS FREE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( ( USED.USED_GB * 100 ) / DECODE ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB, 0, 1, A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ) ), 2 ) AS USED_PCT FROM ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS SIZE_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND T.TARGET_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceAllocated' ) AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) A_SIZE , ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS USED_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND T.TARGET_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 ! = 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceUsed' ) AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) USED WHERE A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP = USED.MONTH_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY --A_SIZE.TARGET_NAME TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) ORDER BY TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' )

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/01/06 (of last update/validation) /* select TARGET_NAME DATABASE_NAME --, TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, SERVICE_TYPE --, MONITORING_MODE --, LAST_LOAD_TIME --, ORACLE_HOME --, ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('rac_database') order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME */ select --CM_TARGET_GUID DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME --, CM_TARGET_NAME TARGET_NAME --, INSTANCE_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE --, CM_SNAPSHOT_TYPE --, LAST_COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP --, ECM_SNAPSHOT_ID --, BANNER , HOST_NAME --, STARTUP_TIME --, LOGINS --, OPEN_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET --, DV_STATUS_CODE , CREATION_DATE --, RELEASE , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where --instr(CM_TARGET_NAME, :DATABASE_NAME) > 0 AND TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' order by TARGET_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) /*select TARGET_NAME --, TARGET_TYPE , HOST_NAME , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, SERVICE_TYPE --, MONITORING_MODE --, LAST_LOAD_TIME --, ORACLE_HOME --, ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from MGMT_TARGETS where --TARGET_NAME like :TARGET_NAME% TARGET_TYPE in ('oracle_database') AND instr(TARGET_NAME, :TARGET_NAME) > 0 order by TARGET_TYPE , TARGET_NAME */ select --CM_TARGET_GUID DATABASE_NAME --, GLOBAL_NAME , TARGET_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME --, DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE --, LOG_MODE --, CM_SNAPSHOT_TYPE --, LAST_COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP --, ECM_SNAPSHOT_ID --, BANNER , HOST_NAME , STARTUP_TIME , LOGINS , OPEN_MODE --, DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE --, CHARACTERSET --, NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET --, DV_STATUS_CODE --, CREATION_DATE --, RELEASE --, EDITION --, IS_64BIT --, REL_STATUS --, SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where --instr(CM_TARGET_NAME, :DATABASE_NAME) > 0 AND DATABASE_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME AND TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' order by TARGET_NAME

select CLUSTER_NAME , CRS_HOME , ACTIVE_VERSION , NODE_LIST , MGMT_DB_CONFIGURED , SCAN_NAME , SCAN_PORT , EONS_PORT --, GNS , OCR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_LOCATION --, VENDOR_CLUSTER , OCR_MIRROR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_MIRROR_LOCATION --, GNS_DOMAIN --, GNS_SUBNET from MGMT_CLUSTER_CONFIG where instr((select NODE_LIST from dual), substr(:HOST_NAME, 1, instr(:HOST_NAME, '.')-1)) >0 order by CLUSTER_NAME

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES WHERE ENTITY_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME order by ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME

select distinct CLUSTER_NAME , CRS_HOME , ACTIVE_VERSION , NODE_LIST , SCAN_NAME , SCAN_PORT , MGMT_DB_CONFIGURED , EONS_PORT --, GNS , OCR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_LOCATION --, VENDOR_CLUSTER , OCR_MIRROR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_MIRROR_LOCATION --, GNS_DOMAIN --, GNS_SUBNET from MGMT_CLUSTER_CONFIG order by CLUSTER_NAME

select CLUSTER_NAME , DATABASE_UNIQUE_NAME DATABASE , SERVICE_NAME , SERVICE_TYPE , ENABLED , TAFPOLICY , PREFERRED_INSTANCES , AVAILABLE_INSTANCES , RUNNING_INSTANCES , SERVER_GROUP , RESOURCE_NAME --, SERVICE_CENTRIC_TYPE , SERVICE_CARDINALITY , DATABASE_TYPE , PDB_NAME , PQ_SERVICE_NAME from MGMT_RAC_SERVICES where CLUSTER_NAME = :CLUSTER_NAME order by CLUSTER_NAME , DATABASE_UNIQUE_NAME , SERVICE_NAME

select HOST_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME from MGMT_ASM_INSTANCE_ECM where ( instr((select :NODE_LIST from dual), substr(HOST_NAME, 1, instr(HOST_NAME, '.')-1)) >0 or instr((select :NODE_LIST from dual),HOST_NAME)> 0 ) order by HOST_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME

select DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , CREATION_DATE , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' AND ( instr((select :NODE_LIST from dual), substr(HOST_NAME, 1, instr(HOST_NAME, '.')-1)) >0 or instr((select :NODE_LIST from dual),HOST_NAME)> 0 ) order by DATABASE_NAME

with dblist as ( select distinct HOST_NAME , DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , CREATION_DATE , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' AND ( instr(:NODE_LIST, substr(HOST_NAME, 1, instr(HOST_NAME, '.')-1)) >0 or instr(:NODE_LIST,HOST_NAME)> 0 ) order by HOST_NAME , DATABASE_NAME ) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT distinct DB_NAME , listagg(DISKGROUP, ', ') within group(order by M.ECM_SNAPSHOT_ID, d.database_name) as DISKGROUPS FROM MGMT_ASM_CLIENT_ECM M , dblist D where DB_NAME = D.DATABASE_NAME group by DB_NAME , ECM_SNAPSHOT_ID , DATABASE_NAME , INSTANCE_NAME order by DB_NAME

select cluster_name , db_name , listagg(sid, ', ') within group(order by cluster_name, db_name) "DB Instances" , listagg(host_name, ', ') within group(order by cluster_name, db_name) "Node List" , service_name from --MGMT_RACDB_CONFIG_ECM GP_DB_ASSOC_DATA where CLUSTER_NAME = :CLUSTER_NAME group by cluster_name , db_name , service_name order by cluster_name , db_name , service_name

SELECT CM_TARGET_TYPE TARGET_TYPE , CM_TARGET_NAME TARGET_NAME , LISTENER_HOST , LISTENER_PORT FROM CM$MGMT_DB_LSNR_CONFIG_ECM where LISTENER_HOST = :SCAN_NAME AND CM_TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' order by CM_TARGET_TYPE , CM_TARGET_NAME

SELECT HOST , HOME_NAME , HOME_LOCATION , PLATFORM , IS_PSU , IS_ONLINE_PATCH , PATCH_RELEASE , PATCH , INSTALLATION_TIME , BUGS --, TARGET_GUID --, CONTAINER_GUID FROM MGMT$APPLIED_PATCHES where --TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' AND ( instr((select :NODE_LIST from dual), substr(HOST, 1, instr(HOST, '.')-1)) >0 or instr((select :NODE_LIST from dual),HOST)> 0 ) order by HOME_NAME , HOME_LOCATION , IS_PSU , PATCH_RELEASE , PATCH , INSTALLATION_TIME

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES WHERE ENTITY_NAME = :CLUSTER_NAME order by ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , VIOLATION_TYPE , ALERT_STATE , trunc(ALERT_DURATION,3) ALERT_DURATION --, TARGET_GUID --, VIOLATION_GUID --, VIOLATION_LEVEL --, CYCLE_GUID --, METRIC_NAME --, METRIC_COLUMN --, METRIC_GUID , METRIC_LABEL , COLUMN_LABEL --, COLUMN_LABEL_NLSID --, KEY_VALUE --, KEY_VALUE2 --, KEY_VALUE3 --, KEY_VALUE4 --, KEY_VALUE5 --, KEY_VALUE6 --, KEY_VALUE7 , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , MESSAGE --, MESSAGE_NLSID , MESSAGE_PARAMS --, ACTION_MESSAGE --, ACTION_MESSAGE_NLSID --, ACTION_MESSAGE_PARAMS --, TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, EVENT_INSTANCE_ID FROM MGMT$ALERT_HISTORY WHERE TARGET_NAME = :CLUSTER_NAME AND COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 91 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2019/01/27 (of last update/validation) select HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME DISPLAY_NAME --, SERVICE_TYPE --, MONITORING_MODE --, LAST_LOAD_TIME --, ORACLE_HOME --, ORACLE_CONFIG_HOME from MGMT_TARGETS where TARGET_TYPE in ('oracle_listener') --AND --HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by HOST_NAME
select HOST_NAME , DB_NAME , SID , SERVICE_NAME , CLUSTER_NAME from GP_DB_ASSOC_DATA where HOST_NAME = :HOST_NAME order by HOST_NAME , DB_NAME , SID

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES WHERE ENTITY_NAME = :TARGET_NAME order by ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , VIOLATION_TYPE , ALERT_STATE , trunc(ALERT_DURATION,3) ALERT_DURATION --, TARGET_GUID --, VIOLATION_GUID --, VIOLATION_LEVEL --, CYCLE_GUID --, METRIC_NAME --, METRIC_COLUMN --, METRIC_GUID , METRIC_LABEL , COLUMN_LABEL --, COLUMN_LABEL_NLSID --, KEY_VALUE --, KEY_VALUE2 --, KEY_VALUE3 --, KEY_VALUE4 --, KEY_VALUE5 --, KEY_VALUE6 --, KEY_VALUE7 , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , MESSAGE --, MESSAGE_NLSID , MESSAGE_PARAMS --, ACTION_MESSAGE --, ACTION_MESSAGE_NLSID --, ACTION_MESSAGE_PARAMS --, TYPE_DISPLAY_NAME --, EVENT_INSTANCE_ID FROM MGMT$ALERT_HISTORY WHERE TARGET_NAME = :TARGET_NAME AND COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 91 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP

SELECT TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS CALENDAR_MONTH , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ) , 2 ) AS SIZE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( USED.USED_GB ) , 2 ) AS USED_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB - USED.USED_GB ) , 2 ) AS FREE_GB , ROUND ( AVG ( ( USED.USED_GB * 100 ) / DECODE ( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB , 0 , 1 , A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ) ) , 2 ) AS USED_PCT FROM ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS SIZE_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceAllocated' ) AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= '2018-12-01' AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= SYSdATE GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) A_SIZE , ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM ( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS USED_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ) ) AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceUsed' ) AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= '2018-12-01' AND M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= SYSDATE GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP ) USED WHERE A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP = USED.MONTH_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) ORDER BY TO_DATE ( TO_CHAR ( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 'YYYY-MM-DD' )

SELECT ENTITY_NAME , ENTITY_TYPE , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES --WHERE --EMD_URL LIKE '%somdbora%'

with db_arch as ( select DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , listagg(INSTANCE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN Group (order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN ) as instances , listagg(HOST_NAME, ', ') WITHIN Group (order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN ) as servers , DBVERSION , LOG_MODE from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND LOG_MODE = 'ARCHIVELOG' group by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN order by DATABASE_NAME ), avg_archive as ( SELECT TARGET_NAME , NAME , STATUS , INPUT_TYPE , OUTPUT_DEVICE_TYPE , START_TIME , END_TIME , TIME_TAKEN_DISPLAY , CASE WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INPUT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END INPUT_BYTES , CASE WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(OUTPUT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END OUTPUT_BYTES FROM MGMT$DB_BACKUP_HISTORY a , db_arch b WHERE ( a.TARGET_NAME = b.GLOBAL_NAME OR a.TARGET_NAME = b.DATABASE_NAME ) AND trunc(start_time) = trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by START_TIME ) , disk_groups as ( select distinct DISK_GROUP, trunc(TOTAL_SIZE,2) TOTAL_SIZE from MGMT_ASM_DISKGROUP_ECM_E ) , file_systems as ( SELECT distinct A.TARGET_NAME , A.NAME , ROUND( A.SIZEB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) SIZE_GB , ROUND( A.USEDB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) USED_GB , ROUND( A.FREEB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024,2 ) FREE_GB FROM MGMT$STORAGE_REPORT_DATA A WHERE ( NAME like '/u0_' or NAME like 'D:%' or NAME like 'E:%' ) ORDER BY A.TARGET_NAME , A.NAME ) SELECT distinct c.servers , CASE WHEN instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_') > 1 then substr(a.TARGET_NAME, 1, instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE a.TARGET_NAME END TARGET_NAME , c.instances , a.VALUE db_recovery_file_dest , CASE WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN b.VALUE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.VALUE,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END db_recovery_file_dest_size --, D.TOTAL_SIZE FROM MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS a , MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS b , db_arch c , disk_groups d --, file_systems e WHERE a.HOST_NAME = b.HOST_NAME AND a.TARGET_NAME = b.TARGET_NAME AND --a.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND --b.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND a.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest' AND b.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' AND lower(a.target_name) like lower(c.database_name)||'%' AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(a.host_name))=1 AND a.value like '%'||D.DISK_GROUP union SELECT distinct c.servers , CASE WHEN instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_') > 1 then substr(a.TARGET_NAME, 1, instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE a.TARGET_NAME END TARGET_NAME , c.instances , a.VALUE db_recovery_file_dest , CASE WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN b.VALUE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.VALUE,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END db_recovery_file_dest_size --, E.FREE_GB FROM MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS a , MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS b , db_arch c --, disk_groups d , file_systems e WHERE a.HOST_NAME = b.HOST_NAME AND a.TARGET_NAME = b.TARGET_NAME AND a.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND b.HOST_NAME = e.TARGET_NAME AND a.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest' AND b.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' AND lower(a.target_name) like lower(c.database_name)||'%' AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(a.host_name))>=1 AND substr(a.value,1,4) = e.name order by --a.HOST_NAME TARGET_NAME

with db_arch as ( select DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , listagg(INSTANCE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN Group (order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN ) as instances , listagg(HOST_NAME, ', ') WITHIN Group (order by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN ) as servers , DBVERSION , LOG_MODE from MGMT$DB_DBNINSTANCEINFO ddie where TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND LOG_MODE = 'ARCHIVELOG' group by DATABASE_NAME , GLOBAL_NAME , DBVERSION , TARGET_TYPE , LOG_MODE , DEFAULT_TEMP_TABLESPACE , CHARACTERSET , NATIONAL_CHARACTERSET , EDITION , IS_64BIT , REL_STATUS , SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN order by DATABASE_NAME ), avg_archive as ( SELECT TARGET_NAME , NAME , STATUS , INPUT_TYPE , OUTPUT_DEVICE_TYPE , START_TIME , END_TIME , TIME_TAKEN_DISPLAY , CASE WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INPUT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INPUT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INPUT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END INPUT_BYTES , CASE WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN OUTPUT_BYTES >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(OUTPUT_BYTES/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(OUTPUT_BYTES,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END OUTPUT_BYTES FROM MGMT$DB_BACKUP_HISTORY a , db_arch b WHERE a.TARGET_NAME = b.GLOBAL_NAME OR a.TARGET_NAME = b.DATABASE_NAME order by START_TIME )
SELECT distinct c.servers , CASE WHEN instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_') > 1 then substr(a.TARGET_NAME, 1, instr(a.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE a.TARGET_NAME END TARGET_NAME , c.instances , a.VALUE db_recovery_file_dest , CASE WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN b.VALUE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN b.VALUE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(b.VALUE/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(b.VALUE,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END db_recovery_file_dest_size FROM MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS a , MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS b , db_arch c WHERE a.HOST_NAME = b.HOST_NAME AND a.TARGET_NAME = b.TARGET_NAME AND a.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest' AND b.NAME = 'db_recovery_file_dest_size' AND lower(a.target_name) like lower(c.database_name)||'%' AND instr(lower(c.servers), lower(a.host_name))>=1 order by --a.HOST_NAME TARGET_NAME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , INPUT_TYPE , trunc(START_TIME) START_DAY , to_char(START_TIME, 'Day') "DAY" , CASE WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES) >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/(1024*1024),2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES) >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/1024,2),'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(INPUT_BYTES),'FM9000.00') || ' B' END INPUT_BYTES , CASE WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' TB' WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES)/24 >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/(1024*1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' GB' WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES)/24 >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/(1024*1024)/24,2),'FM9000.00') || ' MB' WHEN sum(INPUT_BYTES)/24 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/1024,2)/24,'FM9000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(sum(INPUT_BYTES)/24,'FM9000.00') || ' B' END HOURLY_AVERAGE , round(AVG(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_AVERAGE_GB , round(MAX(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_MAX_GB , round(MIN(sum(input_bytes)/1024/1024/1024) over (order by trunc(start_time) ROWS BETWEEN 99 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) DAILY_MIN_GB FROM MGMT$DB_BACKUP_HISTORY WHERE ( TARGET_NAME = :TARGET_NAME OR TARGET_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME ) AND INPUT_TYPE = 'ARCHIVELOG' AND trunc (start_time) between trunc(sysdate) - 31 AND trunc(sysdate) group by TARGET_NAME , INPUT_TYPE , trunc(start_time) , to_char(START_TIME, 'Day') order by trunc(start_time)

with file_systems as ( SELECT distinct A.TARGET_NAME , A.NAME , ROUND( A.SIZEB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) SIZE_GB , ROUND( A.USEDB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) USED_GB , ROUND( A.FREEB / 1024 / 1024 / 1024, 2 ) FREE_GB FROM MGMT$STORAGE_REPORT_DATA A WHERE ( NAME like '/u0_' or NAME like 'D:%' or NAME like 'E:%' ) ORDER BY A.TARGET_NAME , A.NAME ) , disk_groups as ( SELECT MAX( LAST_COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP )LAST_COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , DISK_GROUP , TRUNC( TOTAL_SIZE, 2 )TOTAL_SIZE FROM CM$MGMT_ASM_DISKGROUP_ECM GROUP BY DISK_GROUP , TRUNC( TOTAL_SIZE, 2 ) ) , filesys_dg_usage as ( SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_LABEL , METRIC_GROUP_LABEL_NLSID , METRIC_COLUMN_LABEL , METRIC_COLUMN_LABEL_NLSID , UNIT , METRIC_KEY_VALUE , KEY_PART_1 , LAST_COLLECTION_TIME , round(NUM_VALUE/1024,3) NUM_VALUE , STR_VALUE , VALUE from GC_METRIC_LATEST WHERE METRIC_GROUP_NAME IN( 'Filesystems' , 'DiskGroup_Usage' ) ) /* select :TARGET_NAME Database_name , DISK_GROUP , TOTAL_SIZE from disk_groups where '+'||DISK_GROUP = :DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST union select :TARGET_NAME Database_name , NAME , FREE_GB from file_systems where instr(:SERVERS, TARGET_NAME) >= 1 and substr( :DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST, 1, 4 ) = substr( NAME, 1, 4 ) */ select a.METRIC_KEY_VALUE , round(a.NUM_VALUE/1024,3) total_gb , round(b.NUM_VALUE/1024,3) free_gb from GC_METRIC_LATEST a , GC_METRIC_LATEST b WHERE a.METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'DiskGroup_Usage' AND a.METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'total_mb' AND b.METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'free_mb' AND a.METRIC_GROUP_NAME = b.METRIC_GROUP_NAME AND a.METRIC_KEY_VALUE = b.METRIC_KEY_VALUE AND '+'||a.METRIC_KEY_VALUE = :DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST union select c.METRIC_KEY_VALUE , round(c.NUM_VALUE/1024,3) total_gb , round(d.NUM_VALUE/1024,3) free_gb from GC_METRIC_LATEST c , GC_METRIC_LATEST d WHERE c.METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'Filesystems' AND c.METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'size' AND d.METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'available' AND c.METRIC_GROUP_NAME = d.METRIC_GROUP_NAME AND c.METRIC_KEY_VALUE = d.METRIC_KEY_VALUE AND instr(:SERVERS, c.ENTITY_NAME) >=1 AND d.ENTITY_NAME = :SERVERS AND ( c.METRIC_KEY_VALUE = substr(:DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST, 1, 4 ) or substr(d.METRIC_KEY_VALUE,1,3) = substr(:DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST, 1,3) )
SELECT DISTINCT METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME FROM GC_METRIC_LATEST ORDER BY METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME
