select CLUSTER_NAME , CRS_HOME , ACTIVE_VERSION , NODE_LIST , MGMT_DB_CONFIGURED , SCAN_NAME , SCAN_PORT , EONS_PORT --, GNS , OCR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_LOCATION --, VENDOR_CLUSTER , OCR_MIRROR_LOCATION , VOTING_DISK_MIRROR_LOCATION --, GNS_DOMAIN --, GNS_SUBNET from MGMT_CLUSTER_CONFIG where instr((select NODE_LIST from dual), substr(:SERVERS, 1, instr(:SERVERS, '.')-1)) >0 order by CLUSTER_NAME

SELECT TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM' ), 'YYYY-MM' ) AS CALENDAR_MONTH , ROUND( AVG( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ), 2 ) AS SIZE_GB , ROUND( AVG( USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS USED_GB , ROUND( AVG( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB - USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS FREE_GB , ROUND( AVG(( USED.USED_GB * 100 )/ DECODE( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB, 0, 1, A_SIZE.SIZE_GB )), 2 ) AS USED_PCT FROM ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS SIZE_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW( :TARGET_GUID )AND T.TARGET_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ))AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceAllocated' )AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE --Below line gives a date of January 01 or previous year (e.g. 2018-01-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - 1||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND --Below line gives a date of first pr previous month (e.g. 2019-03-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP )A_SIZE ,( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM( M.AVERAGE / 1024 )AS USED_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND T.TARGET_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ))AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceUsed' )AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE --Below line gives a date of January 01 or previous year (e.g. 2018-01-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - 1||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND --Below line gives a date of first pr previous month (e.g. 2019-03-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP )USED WHERE A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP = USED.MONTH_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY TO_CHAR( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM' ) ORDER BY TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM' ), 'YYYY-MM' )

SELECT :DATABASE_NAME , TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM' ), 'YYYY-MM' ) AS CALENDAR_MONTH , ROUND( AVG( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB ), 2 ) AS SIZE_GB , ROUND( AVG( USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS USED_GB , ROUND( AVG( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB - USED.USED_GB ), 2 ) AS FREE_GB , ROUND( AVG(( USED.USED_GB * 100 )/ DECODE( A_SIZE.SIZE_GB, 0, 1, A_SIZE.SIZE_GB )), 2 ) AS USED_PCT FROM ( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM( M.AVERAGE / 1024 ) AS SIZE_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW( :TARGET_GUID )AND T.TARGET_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ))AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceAllocated' )AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE --Below line gives a date of January 01 or previous year (e.g. 2018-01-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - 1||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND --Below line gives a date of first pr previous month (e.g. 2019-03-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP )A_SIZE ,( SELECT M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP AS MONTH_TIMESTAMP , SUM( M.AVERAGE / 1024 )AS USED_GB FROM MGMT$METRIC_DAILY M , MGMT$TARGET_TYPE T WHERE --T.TARGET_GUID = HEXTORAW ( :TARGET_GUID ) AND T.TARGET_NAME = :GLOBAL_NAME AND ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'rac_database' OR ( T.TARGET_TYPE = 'oracle_database' AND T.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST' ))AND M.TARGET_GUID = T.TARGET_GUID AND M.METRIC_GUID = T.METRIC_GUID AND T.METRIC_NAME = 'tbspAllocation' AND ( T.METRIC_COLUMN = 'spaceUsed' )AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= :START_DATE AND --M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= :END_DATE --Below line gives a date of January 01 or previous year (e.g. 2018-01-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP >= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - 1||'-01-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND --Below line gives a date of first pr previous month (e.g. 2019-03-01) M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP <= to_date((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM')||'-01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 1 GROUP BY M.METRIC_COLUMN , M.ROLLUP_TIMESTAMP )USED WHERE A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP = USED.MONTH_TIMESTAMP GROUP BY TO_CHAR( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM' ) ORDER BY TO_DATE( TO_CHAR( A_SIZE.MONTH_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM' ), 'YYYY-MM' )

/* replace it INIT parameters and move Manageable Entities to the end */
SELECT HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME , NAME , ISDEFAULT , VALUE , DATATYPE FROM MGMT$DB_INIT_PARAMS WHERE CASE WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE TARGET_NAME END = upper(:DATABASE_NAME) order by TARGET_NAME , NAME /* SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , HOST_NAME , EMD_URL , CASE WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Ignored' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Not managed yet' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Managed' WHEN MANAGE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Managed target component' ELSE to_char(MANAGE_STATUS) END MANAGE_STATUS , CASE WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 0 THEN 'Cannot promote (existence only entity)' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 1 THEN 'Eligible for promotion' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 2 THEN 'Promotion in progress' WHEN PROMOTE_STATUS = 3 THEN 'Promoted' ELSE to_char(PROMOTE_STATUS) END PROMOTE_STATUS , CASE WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 0 THEN 'Not broken' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 1 THEN 'Missing required properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 2 THEN 'Metadata not found' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 4 THEN 'Error computing dynamic properties' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 8 THEN 'Dynamic property missing in the result' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 16 THEN 'Target name not specified' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 32 THEN 'Target could not be saved' WHEN BROKEN_REASON = 64 THEN 'Errors in target test metrics' ELSE TO_CHAR(BROKEN_REASON) END BROKEN_REASON , CREATION_DATE FROM EM_MANAGEABLE_ENTITIES WHERE ENTITY_NAME = :DATABASE_NAME order by ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME */

SELECT HOST_NAME , TARGET_NAME --, TARGET_TYPE --, TARGET_GUID --, COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , NAME , SELECTED FROM MGMT$DB_OPTIONS WHERE CASE WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE TARGET_NAME END = upper(:DATABASE_NAME) order by NAME

NOT in ('SYSTEM','SYSAUX') AND METRIC_KEY_VALUE NOT like '%TEMP%' AND METRIC_KEY_VALUE NOT like '%UNDO%' ) , USED_SIZE AS ( select sum(TS_USED_MB) USED_SIZE from ts_usage )

CASE WHEN DB_SIZE >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DB_SIZE/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN DB_SIZE >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(DB_SIZE/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(DB_SIZE, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END DB_SIZE from DB_SIZE ) DB_SIZE, ( select CASE WHEN SYSTEM_FILES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(SYSTEM_FILES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN SYSTEM_FILES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(SYSTEM_FILES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSTEM_FILES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END SYSTEM_FILES from SYSTEM_FILES ) SYSTEM_FILES, ( select CASE WHEN UNDO_FILES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(UNDO_FILES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN UNDO_FILES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(UNDO_FILES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(UNDO_FILES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END UNDO_FILES from UNDO_FILES ) UNDO_FILES, ( select CASE WHEN APP_DATAFILES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(APP_DATAFILES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN APP_DATAFILES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(APP_DATAFILES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(APP_DATAFILES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END APP_DATAFILES from APP_DATAFILES ) APP_DATAFILES, ( select CASE WHEN TEMP_FILES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_FILES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN TEMP_FILES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(TEMP_FILES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TEMP_FILES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END TEMP_FILES from TEMP_FILES ) TEMP_FILES, ( select CASE WHEN USED_SIZE >= (1024*1024) then END USED_SIZE from USED_SIZE) USED_TOTAL , ( select TO_CHAR(DB_SIZE,'FM9900000.000') || ' MB' from DB_SIZE ) DB_SIZE_MB , ( select TO_CHAR(ROUND(DB_SIZE/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' from DB_SIZE ) DB_SIZE_GB , ( select TO_CHAR(ROUND(DB_SIZE/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' from DB_SIZE ) DB_SIZE_TB from dual /* , ( select CASE WHEN LFMBYTES >= (1024*1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(LFMBYTES/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' WHEN LFMBYTES >= (1024) then TO_CHAR(ROUND(LFMBYTES/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(LFMBYTES, 'FM9900.000') || ' MB' END from dblf ) LOGFILES , ( select TO_CHAR(DBTOTALMB,'FM9900000.000') || ' MB' from dbtotal ) "DB TOTAL MB" , ( select TO_CHAR(ROUND(DBTOTALMB/(1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' GB' from dbtotal ) "DB TOTAL GB" , ( select TO_CHAR(ROUND(DBTOTALMB/(1024*1024), 3),'FM9900.000') || ' TB' from dbtotal ) "DB TOTAL TB" from dual */ order by SYSDATE

c.METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'spaceAllocated' AND d.METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'spaceUsed' AND c.METRIC_GROUP_NAME = d.METRIC_GROUP_NAME AND c.METRIC_KEY_VALUE = d.METRIC_KEY_VALUE AND c.ENTITY_NAME = d.ENTITY_NAME order by c.ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_KEY_VALUE ) , max_dbfile_size as ( SELECT TARGET_NAME , TABLESPACE_NAME , ROUND(sum(decode(increment_by, null, file_size, MAX_FILE_SIZE))/1024/1024,2) MAX_FILE_SIZE , count(FILE_NAME) FILES FROM MGMT$DB_DATAFILES where CASE WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ SELECT distinct :DATABASE_NAME DATABASE_NAME --, A.TARGET_NAME , A.TABLESPACE_NAME , CASE WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '32768' THEN '32K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '16384' THEN '16K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '8192' THEN '8K' WHEN BLOCK_SIZE = '4096' THEN '4K' ELSE to_char(BLOCK_SIZE) END BLOCK_SIZE , LOGGING , ALLOCATION_TYPE , CASE WHEN TABLESPACE_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TABLESPACE_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM90000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TABLESPACE_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TABLESPACE_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM90000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TABLESPACE_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TABLESPACE_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM90000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TABLESPACE_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TABLESPACE_SIZE/1024,2),'FM90000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TABLESPACE_SIZE,'FM90000.00') || ' B' END TS_SIZE , CASE WHEN b.TS_USED_MB >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TS_USED_MB/(1024*1024),3), 'FM90000.000') || ' TB' WHEN b.TS_USED_MB >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TS_USED_MB/(1024),3), 'FM90000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(B.TS_USED_MB, 'FM90000.000') || ' MB' END TS_USED , CASE WHEN (ROUND(A.TABLESPACE_SIZE/1024/1024) - B.TS_USED_MB) >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(((A.TABLESPACE_SIZE/1024/1024) - B.TS_USED_MB)/(1024*1024),3), 'FM90000.000') || ' TB' WHEN (ROUND(A.TABLESPACE_SIZE/1024/1024) - B.TS_USED_MB) >= (1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(((A.TABLESPACE_SIZE/1024/1024) - B.TS_USED_MB)/(1024),3), 'FM90000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR((ROUND(A.TABLESPACE_SIZE/1024/1024) - B.TS_USED_MB), 'FM90000.000') || ' MB' END TS_FREE , CASE WHEN C.MAX_FILE_SIZE/1024 >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(C.MAX_FILE_SIZE/1024/1024,3), 'FM90000.000') || ' TB' WHEN C.MAX_FILE_SIZE >= a.BLOCK_SIZE*4-1 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(C.MAX_FILE_SIZE/1024,3), 'FM90000.000') || ' GB' ELSE TO_CHAR(ROUND(C.MAX_FILE_SIZE,3), 'FM90000.000') || ' MB' END MAX_TS_SIZE , ROUND(b.TS_USED_MB/C.MAX_FILE_SIZE*100, 3) PCT_USED , ROUND((C.MAX_FILE_SIZE- b.TS_USED_MB)/C.MAX_FILE_SIZE*100, 3) PCT_FREE , C.FILES , CONTENTS , BIGFILE , ENCRYPTED , EXTENT_MANAGEMENT , SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT , STATUS FROM MGMT$DB_TABLESPACES a , TS_USAGE b , max_dbfile_size c where a.TABLESPACE_NAME = B.METRIC_KEY_VALUE AND A.TABLESPACE_NAME = C.TABLESPACE_NAME AND --A.HOST_NAME = C.HOST_NAME AND a.CONTENTS NOT IN ('UNDO','TEMPORARY') AND CASE WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE A.TARGET_NAME END = CASE WHEN INSTR( B.ENTITY_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( B.ENTITY_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(B.ENTITY_NAME), 1, INSTR(B.ENTITY_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(B.ENTITY_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( B.ENTITY_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(B.ENTITY_NAME), 1, INSTR(B.ENTITY_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( B.ENTITY_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(B.ENTITY_NAME), 1, INSTR(B.ENTITY_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE B.ENTITY_NAME END AND CASE WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE A.TARGET_NAME END = CASE WHEN INSTR( C.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( C.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(C.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(C.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(C.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( C.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(C.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(C.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( C.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(C.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(C.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE C.TARGET_NAME END AND CASE WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( A.TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(A.TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(A.TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) ELSE A.TARGET_NAME END = upper(:DATABASE_NAME) ORDER BY a.TABLESPACE_NAME;

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME , COUNT_OF_COLLECTIONS , round(AVG_VALUE,3) AVG_VALUE , round(MIN_VALUE,3) MIN_VALUE , round(MAX_VALUE,3) MAX_VALUE , round(STDDEV_VALUE,3) STDDEV_VALUE FROM --GC_METRIC_VALUES_DAILY GC_METRIC_VALUES_HOURLY where METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'archFull' AND METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'archUsedPercent' AND COLLECTION_TIME between trunc(sysdate) - 1 and trunc(sysdate) AND instr(ENTITY_NAME, :DATABASE_NAME) >=1 order by ENTITY_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME , COUNT_OF_COLLECTIONS , round(AVG_VALUE,3) AVG_VALUE , round(MIN_VALUE,3) MIN_VALUE , round(MAX_VALUE,3) MAX_VALUE , round(STDDEV_VALUE,3) STDDEV_VALUE FROM --GC_METRIC_VALUES_DAILY GC_METRIC_VALUES_HOURLY where METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'CPUUsageSummary' AND METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'OverAllUsagePct' AND instr(:SERVERS, ENTITY_NAME) >=1 AND COLLECTION_TIME between trunc(sysdate) - 1 and trunc(sysdate) order by ENTITY_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME

SELECT ENTITY_TYPE , ENTITY_NAME , METRIC_GROUP_NAME , METRIC_COLUMN_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME , COUNT_OF_COLLECTIONS , round(AVG_VALUE,3) AVG_VALUE , round(MIN_VALUE,3) MIN_VALUE , round(MAX_VALUE,3) MAX_VALUE , round(STDDEV_VALUE,3) STDDEV_VALUE FROM --GC_METRIC_VALUES_DAILY GC_METRIC_VALUES_HOURLY where METRIC_GROUP_NAME = 'DiskActivitySummary' AND METRIC_COLUMN_NAME = 'totiosmade' AND instr(:SERVERS, ENTITY_NAME) >=1 AND COLLECTION_TIME between trunc(sysdate) - 1 and trunc(sysdate) order by ENTITY_NAME , COLLECTION_TIME

SELECT TARGET_NAME , TARGET_TYPE , VIOLATION_TYPE , ALERT_STATE , trunc(ALERT_DURATION,3) ALERT_DURATION , METRIC_LABEL , COLUMN_LABEL , COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP , MESSAGE , MESSAGE_PARAMS FROM MGMT$ALERT_HISTORY WHERE CASE WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 AND INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '.' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '.')-1) WHEN INSTR( TARGET_NAME, '_' ) >= 1 THEN SUBSTR(upper(TARGET_NAME), 1, INSTR(TARGET_NAME, '_')-1) END = upper(:DATABASE_NAME) AND ALERT_STATE != 'Clear' AND COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 91 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY COLLECTION_TIMESTAMP desc
